message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to meet you at $12500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $13000? I'm getting a bit anxious to sell this product, but I think it's worth it to you.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to meet you at $12800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $14000? I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $13200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't be able to come to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $13500? I'm really hoping we can wrap this up soon.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $13000. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but no higher. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
